entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
